polished.name: Bicycle
polished.description: A collapsible bike for fast movement.

polished.name: Old Rod
polished.description: Use by water to fish for Pokémon.

polished.name: Good Rod
polished.description: A good Rod for catching Pokémon.

polished.name: Super Rod
polished.description: The best Rod for catching Pokémon.

polished.name: Itemfinder
polished.description: Checks for unseen items in the area.

polished.name: Coin Case
polished.description: Holds up to 50K game coins.

polished.name: Apricorn Box
polished.description: Holds up to 99 of each Apricorn.

polished.name: Wing Case
polished.description: Holds up to 999 of each Wing.

polished.name: Candy Jar
polished.description: Holds up to 99 of each Exp.Candy.

polished.name: Type Chart
polished.description: Summarizes all type advantages.

polished.name: GBC Sounds
polished.description: A music player filled with songs.

polished.name: Blue Card
polished.description: Card to save points.

polished.name: SquirtBottle
polished.description: A bottle used for watering plants.

polished.name: SilphScope2
polished.description: A scope to see invisible Pokémon.

polished.name: Mystery Egg
polished.description: An Egg obtained from Mr.Pokémon.

polished.name: SecretPotion
polished.description: Fully heals any Pokémon.

polished.name: Go-Goggles
polished.description: Nifty goggles for sand or hail.

polished.name: Red Scale
polished.description: A scale from the red Gyarados.

polished.name: Card Key
polished.description: Opens shutters in the Radio Tower.

polished.name: Basement Key
polished.description: Opens doors.

polished.name: Lost Item
polished.description: The Poké Doll lost by the Copycat.

polished.name: Machine Part
polished.description: A machine part for the Power Plant.

polished.name: Rainbow Wing
polished.description: A mystical feather of rainbow colors.

polished.name: Silver Wing
polished.description: A strange, silvercolored feather.

polished.name: Clear Bell
polished.description: Makes a gentle ringing.

polished.name: GS Ball
polished.description: The mysterious Ball.

polished.name: S.S.Ticket
polished.description: A ticket for the S.S.Aqua.

polished.name: Pass
polished.description: A ticket for the Magnet Train.

polished.name: OrangeTicket
polished.description: A ticket for the Seagallop Ferry.

polished.name: MysticTicket
polished.description: A ticket for the Seagallop Ferry.

polished.name: Old Sea Map
polished.description: A faded sea chart of a small island.

polished.name: Lift Key
polished.description: Operates the lift in a building.

polished.name: Harsh Lure
polished.description: A bottle with a cruel scent.

polished.name: Potent Lure
polished.description: A bottle with a strong smell.

polished.name: Malign Lure
polished.description: A bottle with a malevolent odor.

polished.name: Shiny Charm
polished.description: A charm for finding shiny Pokémon.

polished.name: Oval Charm
polished.description: A charm for finding Eggs.

polished.name: Catch Charm
polished.description: A charm for catching Pokémon.
